description: Convert a CASA image to a FITS file

parameters.name: fitsimage
parameters.info: Name of input image FITS file

parameters.name: velocity
parameters.info: Use velocity (rather than frequency) as spectral axis

parameters.name: optical
parameters.info: Use the optical (rather than radio) velocity convention

parameters.name: minpix
parameters.info: Minimum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically dertermined)

parameters.name: stokeslast
parameters.info: Put Stokes axis last in header?

parameters.name: history
parameters.info: Write history to the FITS image?

parameters.name: dropdeg
parameters.info: Drop all degenerate axes (e.g. stokes and/or frequency)
